Key Match Events: KL Rahul, Virat Kohli and SKY led India to score 184 runs in 20 overs.
Bangladesh openers Litton Das (60) and Najmul Hossain Shanto (21) performed well but lost momentum due to rain.
After rain stopped, Bangladesh needed 85 runs in 9 overs but lost quickly.
Arshdeep Singh and Pandya picked two each, and Shami clicked one for India.
India's fielding turned the match on.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli reacted positively to the win against Bangladesh.
Sachin Tendulkar congratulated Team India on its win against Bangladesh.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was affected by rain, leading to revisions in targets and overs.
KL Rahul scored another half-century against Bangladesh.
Dinesh Karthik tagged the game as with an exhilarating atmosphere.
